website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate LEGO Technic set for car lovers, the Porsche 911 RSR will be an intense challenge to assemble correctly, but you’ll have an amazing model when it’s done.
pros: Assemble realistic moving car parts, such as an axel, engine, and steering wheel
Will take some time to complete
cons: A fairly pricy LEGO Technic set

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Had a blast building this. Estimate I spent about 12-15 hours on the process. Kinda sad it’s over, but it looks amazing! Only negative is that the bags are not marked (instructions say they are, but they aren’t). Initially this made for some difficulty and frustration, but it was short lived once I got my bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Beuse

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I loved that fact that there was no bag numbers, it made it a little more tricky to put together and that's the whole idea about the Technic series. Not for Duplo builders :-) End result is great, only problem is where to start putting these things hence I'd love to build more of them. Good times long hours at night and the kid loved to help. Only one set back, the dog ate one piece, had to order that piece.
customer_reviews.author: Bjarne Haug

customer_reviews.title: No bag numbers!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is miserable to assemble due to none of the bags being numbered. I spent most of my time looking for things and hoping they matched the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: EastBayRae

customer_reviews.title: fun build
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 5 stars for how "fun" the build was and how good it looks. However, I have to give it only 4 for how easily it falls apart. Even when I very carefully pick it up on its bottom to move it to a different shelf, something falls off of it. Otherwise, easily one of my top 5 fav kids and its' worth every penny! I'll even go out on a limb to say that this kit looks more accurate (assembled) than the bugatti chiron lego kit.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: LEGO is about building not hunting
customer_reviews.text: There's absolutely no rhyme or reason for what pieces go into which bags. Trying to build this was frustrating to the point of painful just trying to hunt down the smaller pieces in whatever bag they decided to throw them in since it's not like the bags were broken down by shape/color/component/intelligence. The joy of BUILDING lego sets is about building. If all your time is spent trying to just find pieces, it removes all that joy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying until you find out there are missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old son who live Lego and been building different sets since he was 6. He really enjoyed building this and kept him busy for good 3 days. However at the end there were two small blue peaces missing ( see attached image) we had to disassemvle another Lego car he had built earlier and took those two peaces in order to complete the Porsche. That was frustrating and ruined the experience at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Fouad

customer_reviews.title: Fun project for boys
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 9 year old twins. They each built their project differently but they turned out great and they were both very proud of the finished assembly. We also got the optional light package and that added even more fun to the build and they looked great in the dark. It took the boys a couple days to complete the assembly but I don't think they had any problems with the detailed assembly book that had step by step instructions with detailed picture.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reader

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yr old son. I was reluctant do to him being 11, and with reading some of the reviews it seemed like it was on the hard side. My son is real good at putting legos together, more so than his friends his age. He probably put 95% of this car together. And only needed a little help from myself or my husband. The bags are not numbered, but we organized the parts in containers. Take out Chinese containers work the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: a very fun, challenging build
customer_reviews.text: This is proving to be a very fun and challenging build. (I am not done with it yet.) It seems to be a very sturdy model. So far all the gears mesh well and work like they are supposed to. I may update this review when I am done with the model.
customer_reviews.author: jennypatrick29

customer_reviews.title: Bad bagging
customer_reviews.text: This was our 3rd or 4th large LEGO Technic kit and my least favorite. The problem: there was little logic to the way the pieces were bagged, so we spent much more time hunting for pieces than actually putting them together. Other than that, it’s a good, typical Technic car kit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in-person!
customer_reviews.text: This took me about 8-10 hours to build over the course of a week. It was probably my most favorite build of all-time. Such a cool car!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Very involved assembly, instructions very good with detailed drawings, however a couple of steps at the very end need a careful look at the drawing to realize there is a symmetrical step required on the other side. Quite amazed with that many parts there was not one missing part, and actually a few extra specialty parts included which can be knocked off easily!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and its not small
customer_reviews.text: The detail is amazing. It looks really nice. I never get tired of looking at it. Only drawbacks, it was missing a couple of pieces, which I borrowed from the driver seat and made a small adjustment to the front end of the chassis. I was able to easily order the missing piece from Lego.com, free of charge. Also, the piece were all mixed, no number system. That was a bit of a headache. Over all I'm happy with it and I think its tine to start a new car.
customer_reviews.author: NE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lego but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great lego, looks amazing, my son loved it. It did has a missing piece which was inconvenience. Other than that is very nice although a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: if you are looking for a big lego set with prints this is not a good set to get.
customer_reviews.text: this Lego Porsche is big but it has to much stinkers and they mite fall off.i really like the looks but i don't like the fact that you can't see the pistons so well.if this Porsche was bigger than it is i would like it more than a do.there is a full 2 stickers sheets if the porsche had more prints than stickers it would be better for me.i love lego technic sets and i like the detail but if you break it it's hard to fix so you don't want to let a baby mess with it if you can't see them.it's not so hard to build it but it is hard to see the inside.
customer_reviews.author: maged mekhael

customer_reviews.title: What a blast to build
customer_reviews.text: Subject ; male, 41 years of age, American; loved it. First lego in 25+ years had a blast even got the mrs involved laying out the decals. I'm sure it's cool as an actual toy but its shelf swag and works nice
customer_reviews.author: TheCihaks

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old son did it in 4 days!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son thinking it would keep him busy for 3 weeks of winter vacation. Wrong! He finished it in 4 days taking breaks. He did it all on his own. The only downside is, the bags are not numbered. I knew that from reading the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Aleka C. Gayden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit to build!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was soooo cool. I got it for my brother in law (45 yrs old). He loved it. It’s so detailed. It also has a light kit you can buy separately. Fun to put together and fun to display. The picture on the screen doesn’t do it justice. When I saw the box it was even more amazing and the actual kit was even cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan hale

customer_reviews.title: Very fun Lego build!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very neat Lego build! Pictures don't do it justice. My only complaint is that (to make life easier) you're forced to separate parts out before starting in order to make finding them during the build a bit easier, but that's easily accomplished with a sorting system (I use old egg cartons and split everything roughly by size and color). It's a fun build though, and much larger than you'd expect. Better yet, Google "alternative builds" that allow you to build other stuff with the same set!
customer_reviews.author: I. Santana

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my car-loving 7 year old LEGO fanatic. We did the set together- it was a really fun project and the finished project looks amazing. We love the suspension, the steering and watching the engine parts move- really, really cool set.
customer_reviews.author: PuddleToes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing details
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift for my husband, he loves it, he had an amazing time putting it together, all the details are awesome, it actually have suspensions and a cool to assemble motor, the steering wheel works. Pretty pleased about it, lego rocks!
customer_reviews.author: emybege

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them busy
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old grandson loved this Lego set. He couldn't wait to start building it when it arrived as a surprise gift during the COVID lock-down. He is an experienced Lego builder, so it was completed by the next day! lol
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER H LYNT

customer_reviews.title: Just like what I want
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for taking forever to write about this review, it tooks me sometime to finish this masterpiece......even through that i am a young adult! Everything comes as the way I wanted but somehow I can never find one of the pieces while I was trying to finish this one, so I come back and write this review. Any suggestion would be helpful !!!
customer_reviews.author: howard ouyang

customer_reviews.title: Jumbled pieces required too much patience, focus & determination!
customer_reviews.text: Read the 1 & 2;star rating comments before you buy: the bags aren't accurately sorted let alone labelled, so it's more like trying to complete a 1,500 piece jigsaw. Definitely not for anyone without great patience!
customer_reviews.author: Kamadew

customer_reviews.title: It misses a piece!
customer_reviews.text: I had a blast building it half way through, but then i found out it misses a piece. I got frustrated and had to use figure out how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Xing zhang

customer_reviews.title: Fun with Legos
customer_reviews.text: about this for my son who was 13 years old for Christmas took him about 2 days to put it together and he absolutely loves it. I recommend adding the light kit for it makes it a little bit cooler!
customer_reviews.author: ClownPuncher

customer_reviews.title: A Youngster's Dream Car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our 10 year old grandson. He thinks we are the best! Not an easy task to assemble but provided hours of effort with minimal adult input.

customer_reviews.title: A great project
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son and I to build together. This was fun, easy to assemble and really cool. It was a little pricey for a Lego set, but we were both really happy with the end result and the time spent together to build it.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lego
customer_reviews.text: This Lego is amazing I got it and received quite fast it actually came about a month early I build it in 5 hours although the bags are not numbered the is an amazing lego will be buying the other lego cars (Bugatti/Porche 2)

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build with your kid

customer_reviews.text: Grandson had a real good time working on this Lego. He was real proud of it and loves the detail. Took about 10 hours to complete.

customer_reviews.title: Number the bags
customer_reviews.text: Lego dropped the ball on this one you have to sort all pieces as the bags are not marked like the bigger kits like the lambo and the bugatti were but over all the quality with the Legos set are great

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received an package which was opened before. Missing bag so had to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, not at the level of the Porsche gt3 rs, but half the price as well. Nice suspension and engine build but the absence of transmission or gearing makes this slightly less display worthy. Proportions of wheels to wheel arches are a bit awkward if you stare too long.
customer_reviews.author: John Solero

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the gt3rs, same size set just simpler
customer_reviews.text: If i had to dig for a complaint it would be how much digging i had to do, this is one of the newest sets but for some reason they didn't separate parts into numbered bags, so you have to open everything at once.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play, even more fun to build!
customer_reviews.text: This was very fun to build with lots of parts. I really like how there's a shock system for the wheels. There's also the engine that moves and viewable when you lift the hood in the back. The car can be steered with the actual steering wheel and the car is fairly big. Overall, it was a pleasure the build and very entertaining to play.
customer_reviews.author: C. Edward

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful car and big!
customer_reviews.text: Seems pricey for what it is but that’s not amazon thing that’s what they cost at LEGO store! And LEGO store didn’t even have this model in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: Really liked putting this piece together. It was so fun and easy to do. I’ve always loved putting Legos together. Definitely a must have if you like cars and legos

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son had lots of fun putting it together. Package was original but set was missing one lego block so to be able finish it, we had to buy it separately at the store that are selling parts :(
customer_reviews.author: Agata L.

customer_reviews.title: Another High Quality Kit from Lego...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality product. It is fun to assemble because of the very clear step by step instructions. The finished result is very detailed and complicated looking, but because of the instructions anyone can build this if they are are not in a rush. Enjoyable for adults as well as kids...

customer_reviews.title: RC car sized lego set 1000+ pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great lego set for my 12 year old son, challenging rc car sized and just what he was looking for!

customer_reviews.title: See review
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was more complicated in design, but still enjoyed the build. As always Lego is not for the faint of wallet.

customer_reviews.title: Get one for your child or Grandchildren.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 year old Grandson and he loved it. Had it put together in 5 hours. I recommend this for an kid who loves legos.

customer_reviews.title: i recommend you...
customer_reviews.text: the reviews are correct, its a great kit, and the size is very nice.... if you don't want to go crazy go to dollar tree and buy plastic Tupperware bowls and separate as best you can by color because their is no rhyme or reason to the packaging and nothing is marked... once you do that it takes ab 24hr to build at a nice relaxed pace and enjoy as you go.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to relax for adults! High quality!

My young daughters had a great time watching me build and I put them to work sorting pieces. Now that I’m finished I’m a little sad, but I’m already Shopping for my next set. I’ll either go with the Bond car or the Land Rover Defender. I’m officially hooked!

product_meta.title: LEGO Technic Porsche 911 RSR 42096 Race Car Building Set STEM Toy for Boys and Girls Ages 10+ features Porsche Model Car with Toy Engine (1,580 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingKids and adults will come together to celebrate an icon of engineering excellence with the LEGO Technic 42096 Porsche 911 RSR collectible toy car. Developed in partnership with Porsche, this race car set captures the toy vehicle’s powerful appearance with its sharp contours and aerodynamic detailing, including a rear wing with ‘swan neck’ mounts, extended rear diffuser and specially designed side mirrors. Functions of this Porsche model car include a visible, working differential, independent suspension and a six-cylinder boxer toy engine with moving pistons positioned in front of the rear axle, making it a fun engineering toy. Plus, the accessible cockpit in the toy sports car features a radar screen, working steering, fire extinguisher system and even a track map of the Laguna Seca circuit printed onto the driver’s door. Black spoked rims, realistic head and tail lights and an authentic white, red and black color scheme with sticker detailing add the final touches to this awesome LEGO Technic Porsche 911 RSR model car, a perfect display piece for the home or office!
feature_bullets: Kids will love to build and explore the super fast LEGO Technic Porsche 911 RSR toy car, This race car set, with black spoke rims and custom designs, can be used as a collectible toy car for adults or as the perfect STEM toy for kids

This model car kit includes realistic details throughout the Porsche toy car such as aerodynamic bodywork, working steering, track map & more, Plus, this white toy car comes with a full toy engine, making it a fun engineering toy for kids & adults

This LEGO Technic set featuring a toy sports car is an exclusive replica of the Porsche 911 RSR race car and has been developed in partnership with Porsche, This toy car playset will make kids and adults feel like they're in the middle of a NASCAR race!

This LEGO Technic Porsche 911 RSR 42096 building kit can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO building bricks, Kids and adults can come together for hours of building, thinking, and imaginative play

The 1580-piece race car building kit includes a Porsche 911 RSR model car that measures over 5 inches (13cm) high, 19 inches (50cm) long and 7 inches (20cm) wide, This toy vehicle with building bricks is great for boys and girls aged 10+
